price: او يو باران (د كاڼو) مو پرې وواراوه، نو وګوره چې د مجرمانو انجام څنګه شو؟
arabic: وَأَمۡطَرۡنَا عَلَيۡهِم مَّطَرٗاۖ فَٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: wa-amṭarnā ʿalayhim maṭaran fa-unẓur kayfa kāna ʿāqibatu al-muj'rimīna
